name: PKM Library
summary: A curated collection of PKM resources, tools, communities, and experts.
explanation: The Personal Knowledge Management Library (PKM Library) is a massive curated collection of PKM resources, tools, communities, experts, courses, books, videos, podcasts, and more. Created by SÃ©bastien Dubois, it serves as a comprehensive reference for anyone building or improving their PKM practice. Includes a PKM Tools Database for comparing different note-taking applications.

articles.title: Introducing the Personal Knowledge Management Library
